title: 推荐一个叫agecraft的mod
author: Lovin
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Lovin 于 2014-6-24 22:52 编辑 

这是一个自己无意中从国外网站发现的mod，看有谁喜欢找新mod的人试下这个吧。个人在测试时发觉一进去各种mod材质丢失，不知道是什么问题，希望有人试试是否只是我装mod出问题。
这个下载地址我这里（国内）是不用翻墙都能下载的，不知道是不是全部地方都能。
这个mod大概是一个历险类的，时代会随时间流逝而从远古恐龙时代到未来。
下面是原文介绍：

AgeCraft is a mod that adds Ages to Minecraft. The key word of this mod is evolution. Evolution is what gets you to new ages and helps you explore all the features of this mod.This mod is basically a combination of all sorts of mods. You start in the prehistory, where there are dinosaurs and other such creatures. You can just keep crafting better things and while time passes by you will go to another age. The way this will be done is like this: You basically get a message that says: “Get your stuff over here and move to the next age.”, this message won’t be like this, but it is just an example. You can then get some stuff in chests (?) and continue to the next age, which is another dimension. So the terrain regenerated with all the new stuff of that age. There will be serveral ages with all their own specilaties, items, blocks, mobs and terrains. The AgesPrehistory and the Hunter-Gatherer SocietyFarming and Agriculture SocietyAncient EgyptAncient ChinaRoman and Greek EmpiresMiddle AgesEarly Modern AgeIndustrial AgeModern AgeFuture
FeaturesAgesNew biomesNew oresVillages, towns, cities, kingdoms and empiresAdvanced NPCsMagicAdvanced CraftingMore health (100 health points)Mana (used for things like magic and specials)QuestsFurniture and decorationChat systemAdvanced TradingMore……

这个是源地址 http://www.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/agecraft
